issue.title: Error when associate ressource and visualisation
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

When two ressources have the same name, associate a visualisation generates an arror because an the same alias is created in #_sdi_visualisation table.
I think this must be refactored in the future but to fix the bug, we can also remove the unique key for column alias.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Resource, unique, alias is now used as visualization alias. 
#_sdi_visualization schema was updated to fix alias field size to the same size than in #_sdi_resource table.
